CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function does not validate or sanitize the 'item' input, which can lead to Path Traversal and Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities. An attacker could manipulate the 'path' and 'type' properties of the 'item' object to traverse the file system or inject malicious scripts.
